tasks.description: Help by donating any amount to support the purchase of blankets and clothing for families affected by the winter storm.
Please bring warm clothing and blankets to the Boston Community Center on December 6th at 10 AM.
Join us at the distribution center on December 10th at 8 AM to help set up for the event.
Join us on November 1st to help evacuate families affected by the wildfires in the Maule region.
Help set up and manage the shelter for families on November 1st.
Join us on November 5th to help distribute food and supplies to families affected by the floods in Bangkok.
Bring non-perishable food items and essential supplies to the meeting point in Bangkok by November 3rd.
Meet with the volunteer team on November 4th at 1 PM to discuss roles and logistics for the distribution event.
